Pre-Installation

Download

  1. Download Gentoo â‡’ mirror bouncer1).
  2. Download ISO and verification file:
    1. current-admincd-amd64/admincd-amd64-<CCYYMMDDThhmmssZ>.iso
    2. current-admincd-amd64/admincd-amd64-<CCYYMMDDThhmmssZ>.iso.DIGESTS
  1. Import Gentoo PGP key2):

    $ gpg --keyserver hkps://keys.gentoo.org --recv-keys 13EBBDBEDE7A12775DFDB1BABB572E0E2D182910

  2. Verify authenticity and integrity:

    $ gpg --verify ./admincd-amd64-<CCYYMMDDThhmmssZ>.iso.DIGESTS
$ sha512sum -c --ignore-missing ./admincd-amd64-<CCYYMMDDThhmmssZ>.iso.DIGESTS ./admincd-amd64-<CCYYMMDDThhmmssZ>.iso

Flash USB

  1. Make sure the USB filesystem is not mounted!
  2. Flash USB with disk image:

    # dd if=./admincd-amd64-<CCYYMMDDThhmmssZ>.iso of=</dev/sdX> status=progress ; sync

USB Boot

  1. Reboot the system and during the POST phase press BIOS key3) to boot into UEFI.
  2. Make sure that Secure Boot is disabled and reboot.
  3. On next POST phase, press Boot Menu key4) and select (UEFI) USB entry.
1)
Gentoo mirrors: https://www.gentoo.org/downloads/mirrors.
2)
Gentoo signatures: https://www.gentoo.org/downloads/signatures.
3) , 4)
List of POST keys according to vendor: https://www.disk-image.com/faq-bootmenu.htm.
